text: Conilhac-de-la-Montagne is a former commune. It is in the region Occitanie in the Aude department in the south of France. On 1 January 2019, it was merged into the new commune of Roquetaillade-et-Conilhac.Arrêté préfectoral 5 December 2018 == References == Category:Former communes in Aude
title: Conilhac-de-la-Montagne
